group_1.textLeft: Kagome, Kagome!@They finally decided on a discharge date!

group_1.textRight: Congrats.
Will you tell everyone in Promised Blood@the discharge date...?

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm not telling them.
I'm an onlooker from Folklore of Zero.
I'm done with Promised Blood, so they're not@my concern anymore.

group_1.textRight: Right...
(She's going to feel lonely,)
(so I wonder if she's holding back on saying@what she really feels...)
Um, what are you going to do once you're@discharged, Urara?

group_1.textLeft: My role as a spy is over, so I'll go back@to Rabi and the rest.

group_1.textRight: You're going to leave without meeting Miss Kureha@and all of Promised Blood...?

group_1.textLeft: I planned on being through with them@the day Yuna came to check on me...

group_1.textRight: I see...
(Urara, you look reluctant to, though...)
Urara.

group_1.textLeft: Rabi?!
You came all the way out to Futatsugi?!

group_1.textRight: I was worried about you.

group_1.textLeft: Ah... I'm really sorry.
I...@There was someone I really wanted to protect...

group_1.textRight: I believe I know what happened, and I don't blame@you for your decision, Urara.
But I want you to be careful with your life.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... I cross my heart.

group_1.textRight: I'm glad that Kagome Satori is safe as well.

group_1.textLeft: Ah...yes...@Thank you very much...!
Um...do you need me to leave...?

group_1.textRight: I don't mind you being here.
I have no notable information to give, though@I will be talking about Magical Girls.

group_1.textLeft: I understand...

group_1.textRight: Urara, how is your health?

group_1.textLeft: I'm able to move around a lot and my discharge@date got set.

group_1.textRight: I see, that's great.
And regarding Promised Blood?

group_1.textLeft: The entire group is...
...on their way to cooperating with the Union.
Yuna has steered the ship towards a policy of@cooperating with the Kamihama Magia Union,
though some are opposed to it...

group_1.textRight: I see...
If the school you go to has yet to be exposed,
I think you could take advantage of the turmoil@within the group opposing them...
...and quietly make your exit.
What's wrong?

group_1.textLeft: No one knows about my school, but...
Yuna found out that I've been spying in her group...
I'm really sorry I didn't report it to you right away...

group_1.textRight: It's no matter.
What did Yuna Kureha say to you?

group_1.textLeft: That she somehow realized it, but didn't do anything@about it and just kept an eye on me.
She told me she didn't have a problem with me@leaving the group.

group_1.textRight: Oh... That is a surprise, but a good one.
Then there are no issues, and you can leave@Futatsugi later.
...Urara,
can you really leave Promised Blood?

group_1.textLeft: Eh â€“ yeah.
Like I told ya, Yuna gave me her permission.

group_1.textRight: ...That's only for Promised Blood's convenience.
I don't mind if you come back...
...once you've drawn the line in your own way.

group_1.textLeft: Drawn the line...@What do ya mean by that, Rabi?

group_1.textRight: Before anything else, you should realize...
...that you still have a bit more time.

group_1.textCenter: (Miss Himuro also noticed how Urara is feeling...)
